name: Altius
description:
Everyone knows of the underground ruins of Altius. Filled with magic-rich crystals, anyone brave enough to venture into its depths will be set for life! But with ancient guardians wandering the long abandoned mineshafts of Altius, only the skillful can make it back alive. How deep can you go?

Tips! (and maybe spoilers)

- Make sure to manage your crystals wisely, you'll need them for everything, from buying more ammo to progressing to the next stage. If you run out of crystals, all you can do is surrender

- The guardians' only purpose is to guard their sectors from intruders, so stay out of their areas completely, or attack from outside their sector for easy damage!
